description.value:
Requirements You are in Tenacious Stance.

Using your shield, you guard against the movement of foes as surely as if you were a wall of stone. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Raise a Shield] and become anchored for 1 round. While anchored, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tumble Through] your space.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Anchored]
